version_description:
v4.9
* Added 3D Touch support to app icon for devices that support it - allowing quick access to 3D View, Map View or Details and Tabulations page, all for your current location and time.

If you like Sun Seeker, please take a moment to leave a r

v4.9.3
* Fixes 3D Touch action sometimes resulting in blank screen.

v4.9.2

v4.9
* Added 3D Touch support to app icon for devices that support it - allowing quick access to 3D View,

v4.9.4
* Fixes issue where timezone was occasionally missing after searching for and saving for a remote location from the built-in location database.

v4.9.4
* Fixes issue where timezone was occasionally missing after searching for and saving for a remote location from the built-in location database.

v5.0
* Details view now shows Magic Hours for photography - Golden Hour and Blue Hour
* Tabulations of rise/set and elevation data now have Today button, and highlight today's row in the table
* Map view now has a Share button for easier export o

v5.0
* Details view now shows Magic Hours for photography - Golden Hour and Blue Hour
* Tabulations of rise/set and elevation data now have Today button, and highlight today's row in the table
* Map view now has a Share button for easier export o

v5.1
* Added many additional annual tabulations which list times of solar events such as magic hours, twilight periods, as well as exact times on each day when a user-defined solar direction or elevation occurs.
* In 3D View, the green horizon line

v5.1
* Added many additional annual tabulations which list times of solar events such as magic hours, twilight periods, as well as exact times on each day when a user-defined solar direction or elevation occurs.
* In 3D View, the green horizon line

v5.1.2
* Fixes widget appearance for devices running iOS prior to iOS10
* Fix for possible camera/device rotation issues when using 3D view on iPad

v5.1.2
* Fixes widget appearance for devices running iOS prior to iOS10
* Fix for possible camera/device rotation issues when using 3D view on iPad

v5.2
* NEW - Notifications! - Go to Details / More Tables and Notifications to enable device alerts for all manner of sun-related events, such as golden or blue hours, various twilight periods, or sun at a given compass heading or above a given elevati

v5.2
* NEW - Notifications! - Go to Details / More Tables and Notifications to enable device alerts for all manner of sun-related events, such as golden or blue hours, various twilight periods, or sun at a given compass heading or above a given elevati

v5.2.1
* Fixes bug causing some notifications to be missed.

v5.2
* NEW - Notifications! Go to Details / More Tables and Notifications to enable device alerts for all manner of sun-related events, such as golden or blue hours, various twilight

v5.2.1
* Fixes bug causing some notifications to be missed.

v5.2
* NEW - Notifications! Go to Details / More Tables and Notifications to enable device alerts for all manner of sun-related events, such as golden or blue hours, various twilight

v5.3
* Optimisation for latest iOS releases.
* Fixes mirror image bug when taking 3D View screenshot with forward facing camera. Image and solar overlay are now shown without mirror imaging in the saved screenshot.

v5.3
* Optimisation for latest iOS releases.
* Fixes mirror image bug when taking 3D View screenshot with forward facing camera. Image and solar overlay are now shown without mirror imaging in the saved screenshot.

v5.4
* Adds user-specified shadow ratio value to list of available tabulations and notifications
* Fixes issues with tabulations of fixed azimuth times for locations in or near tropics

v5.4
* Adds user-specified shadow ratio value to list of available tabulations and notifications
* Fixes issues with tabulations of fixed azimuth times for locations in or near tropics

v5.4.1
* Fixes tabulations for a user-defined elevation, which were ignoring the entered elevation value.
* Fixes screenshots taken with front-facing camera, which had solar path lines incorrectly oriented when device was being held in a landscape o

v5.4.1
* Fixes tabulations for a user-defined elevation, which were ignoring the entered elevation value.
* Fixes screenshots taken with front-facing camera, which had solar path lines incorrectly oriented when device was being held in a landscape o

v5.5
* The Map view now has a full compass mode, activated by tapping on the compass directions arrows icon at top, right of the Map view. Tap on the same arrows again to toggle back to a north-upwards fixed-direction map. Alternatively, you can use a

v5.5.1
* Fixes issues with shadow ratio table and notifications for given shadow ratio and user defined sun elevation.

v5.5.1
* Fixes issues with shadow ratio table and notifications for given shadow ratio and user defined sun elevation.

v5.5.2
* Fixes compass icon rotation direction in map view

v5.5.2
* Fixes compass icon rotation direction in map view

* Optimised for latest iOS updates and new iPhone form factors
* Fixes inability to set timezone for remote location

* Optimised for latest iOS updates and new iPhone form factors
* Fixes inability to set timezone for remote location

v5.6.1
* Fixes small date/time button on toolbars
* Adds "Rate App" button to Info screen

v5.6.1
* Fixes small date/time button on toolbars
* Adds "Rate App" button to Info screen

v5.6.2
* Fixes minor cosmetic issues and partly obscured search bar on Map view on iPhone X devices

v5.6.2
* Fixes minor cosmetic issues and partly obscured search bar on Map view on iPhone X devices

v5.6.3
* Fixes issue with map lookups sometimes giving API rate limit error messages

v5.6.3
* Fixes issue with map lookups sometimes giving API rate limit error messages

v5.6.4
* Addition of a new Settings option to display latitudes and longitudes in decimal degrees

v5.6.4
* Addition of a new Settings option to display latitudes and longitudes in decimal degrees

v5.6.5
* Ensures that any prompts for app rating are infrequent at most.

Sorry to anyone who felt "bugged" by prompts. This was unintentional, as I had wrongly believed that iOS's built-in rate limiting would have prevented repeated requests, al

v5.6.6
* Optimised for latest iOS version and iPhone models
* Enhancements for efficiency and stability
* A few minor bug fixes and cosmetic adjustments

* Optimised for latest iOS version and iPhone models
* Enhancements for efficiency and stability
* A few minor bug fixes and cosmetic adjustments
* Fix for label misalignment in maps view for recent model devices
* Fix for label misalignment in maps view for recent model devices

* A substantial update with some exciting new features!
* New - date/time scroller on main screen so you can easily watch how sun's path moves across the day and across the calendar
* New - time scroller in all views now shows color-coded tw

v6.0.2
* Adds "Privacy Settings" link to Info view, to provide easier access to app's permission for camera, gps etc.
* A few minor bug fixes

* A few minor bug fixes

* Minor bug fixes

v6.0.7
* After significant location change, time scroller twilight hours were not immediately updated to match new location. Now fixed.

v6.0.7
* After significant location change, time scroller twilight hours were not immediately updated to match new location. Now fixed.

v6.0.8
* Fixes for issues relating to dynamic type and device accessibility settings
* Fixes for label truncations and localisation issues in app and on widget for certain languages

* Fixes for issues relating to dynamic type and device accessibility settings

v6.0.9
* Improves app flow when initially acquiring camera permission

v6.0.9
* Improves app flow when initially acquiring camera permission

v6.0.10
* 3D view line hour markings now include "h" to avoid ambiguity with day of month, for users in 24hr time format locales.
* Some cosmetic adjustments and minor bug fixes.

v6.0.10
* 3D view line hour markings now include "h" to avoid ambiguity with day of month, for users in 24hr time format locales.
* Some cosmetic adjustments and minor bug fixes.

v6.0.11
* In 3D view, app now automatically enters gyroscope-only mode if user manually drags the overlay (previously required tap on compass button to do this). As before, just tap on the gyroscope button to revert to compass mode.
* Translation im

v6.0.11
* In 3D view, app now automatically enters gyroscope-only mode if user manually drags the overlay (previously required tap on compass button to do this). As before, just tap on the gyroscope button to revert to compass mode.
* Translation im

v6.0.12
* Compatibility with and optimization for future iOS updates
* Other minor enhancements

v6.0.12
* Compatibility with and optimization for future iOS updates
* Other minor enhancements

v6.1
* Updated and optimised for iOS13.
* 3D View now offers a choice of camera lenses. Tap on the lens selection button at top/left of view to select an alternative lens. If your device has the new 0.5x ultra-wide lens (11 Pro) this is now the defa

v6.1
* Updated and optimised for iOS13.
* 3D View now offers a choice of camera lenses. Tap on the lens selection button at top/left of view to select an alternative lens. If your device has the new 0.5x ultra-wide lens (11 Pro) this is now the defa

v6.1.1
* Fixes for issues when rotating iPads to different interface orientations
* Some other minor enhancements and fixes

v6.1.1
* Fixes for issues when rotating iPads to different interface orientations
* Some other minor enhancements and fixes

v6.1.2
* FIXED - When saving 3D view image using camera icon, exif location data was not also being saved with the image.

v6.1.2
* FIXED - When saving 3D view image using camera icon, exif location data was not also being saved with the image.

v6.1.3
* Fixes possible error message when attempting to save 3D view screenshots via camera icon.

v6.1.3
* Fixes possible error message when attempting to save 3D view screenshots via camera icon.

v6.1.4
* FIXED - Tables & Notifications / Sun Elevation > x° degrees - for some low-latitude locations, incorrectly showed this event as never occurring across entire year.

v6.1.4
* FIXED - Tables & Notifications / Sun Elevation > x° degrees - for some low-latitude locations, incorrectly showed this event as never occurring across entire year.

v6.2
* Saved Locations view now has a search option which takes you to map search, instead of offering only the built-in list of cities
* Fixes for occasional problems with finding rise/set times at very high latitudes
* App interface language ca

v6.2
* Saved Locations view now has a search option which takes you to map search, instead of offering only the built-in list of cities
* Fixes for occasional problems with finding rise/set times at very high latitudes
* App interface language ca

v6.2.1
* Minor fix for foreign character issues in explanation guide for non-english languages.

v6.2.1
* Minor fix for foreign character issues in explanation guide for non-english languages.

v6.2.2
* Provides an explanatory message if the user accesses the 3D view when a remote location is selected. Note that the solar path would not be correct for the current surrounding view in such cases, which is why the app provides a colored backgrou

v6.2.2
* Provides an explanatory message if the user accesses the 3D view when a remote location is selected. Note that the solar path would not be correct for the current surrounding view in such cases, which is why the app provides a colored backgrou
* Adds three new iOS14 style widgets, including a 24hr clock and solar elevation view and a sorted list of today's rise/culminate/set and current solar elevation.
* Adds three new iOS14 style widgets, including a 24hr clock and solar elevation view and a sorted list of today's rise/culminate/set and current solar elevation.
